inclusion.criterion: They will begin taking iron supplementation for a maximum of 30 days prior to admission.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Girls weighing ≤ 36 kg will take one 300-325 mg tablet oral ferrous gluconate daily
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Inpatient Admission: The subject will be admitted to the CRU, or alternate UVA hospital unit, at 0900-1000 h.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Hemoglobin less than 12 g/dl and hematocrit less than 36%
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 16-year-old girl with Hashimoto disease, but she does not have any exclusion criteria that would make her ineligible for the study.
